aaron_cheng "at" hms.harvard.edu
MD Candidate
Harvard Medical School

I studied Chemical and Physical Biology (with a minor in Mathematics) at Harvard from 2011 to 2015. Afterward I moved across the Charles and began my studies at Harvard Medical School. Within medicine I am primarily interested in hematology and oncology. Aside from my primary passion in medicine, I enjoy learning math and computer science, creating music, playing chess, rock climbing, and writing poetry.

2015-2020
Harvard Medical School
Pathways MD program
HHMI Research Fellow
Advisor: Vijay Sankaran
2011-2015
Harvard College
BA, Chemical and Physical Biology
Thesis Advisor: Paula Fraenkel
